channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trump’s new $900 billion Pentagon funding plan includes ‘enhanced cybersecurity protections’ for Cyber Command - here’s what we know
item.description: New defense bill includes significant provisions for cybersecurity and telecoms.

item.title: Taillé pour les titres AAA, ce laptop gaming HP surpuissant (RTX 5080 + Ultra 9) profite d’une remise de 1 075 €
item.description: Processeur puissant, carte graphique récente, écran bien fluide... Quand il s'agit de faire tourner les gros jeux, le HP Omen Max 16 s'en sort à merveille. La bonne nouvelle, c'est que ce PC portable gamer coûte 2 424,88 euros au lieu de 3 499 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Christopher Nolan’s First Teaser for ‘The Odyssey’ Is Here
item.description: Matt Damon and Tom Holland lead an all-star cast in the Homer adaptation, in theaters July 17, 2026.

item.title: TikTok Shop launches digital gift cards to challenge Amazon and eBay
item.description: TikTok Shop has rolled out a new feature that allows users to purchase digital gift cards, making it easier to help friends and family buy from the millions of products on the app.

item.title: What is the release date for Fallout season 2 episode 2 on Prime Video?
item.description: The second episode of Fallout's second season is almost here – this is when you can stream it.

item.title: While everyone talks about an AI bubble, Salesforce quietly added 6,000 enterprise customers in 3 months
item.description: While Silicon Valley debates whether artificial intelligence has become an overinflated bubble, Salesforce's enterprise AI platform quietly added 6,000 new customers in a single quarter — a 48% increase that executives say demonstrates a widening gap between speculative AI hype and deployed enterprise solutions generating measurable returns.Agentforce, the company's autonomous AI agent platform, now serves 18,500 enterprise customers, up from 12,500 the prior quarter. Those customers collectively run more than three billion automated workflows monthly and have pushed Salesforce's agentic produ...

item.title: Samsung ‘Wide Fold’ rumored to rival Apple’s foldable next year
item.description: Apple's long-rumored foldable iPhone is set to arrive next year, and already faces some preemptive competition from Samsung. Korea's ET News reports that Samsung's upcoming "Wide Fold" is also set to launch in 2026, and will closely mirror the display size and 4:3 aspect ratio of Apple's first foldable. The machine-translated report says the Wide […]...

item.title: Shock, horror! In-car touchscreens are way more distracting than we first thought, says new study
item.description: New research suggests that using a touchscreen when behind the wheel makes you a pretty terrible driver.

item.title: Mullvad VPN boosts WireGuard speeds and stability with new Rust-based engine
item.description: Mullvad VPN is swapping out its engine. The new "GotaTun" implementation, built with Rust, is already slashing app crashes and paving the way for a faster, WireGuard-only future.

item.title: ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ debuts, making $345 million globally in its opening weekend
item.description: In 2025, the only other film with such a lucrative debut was “Zootopia 2”, making $497.2 million in sales over three days. “Avatar: Fire and Ash” opened with $345 million in worldwide sales, according to studio estimates Sunday, notching the second-best global debut of the year and potentially putting James Cameron on course to set yet more blockbuster records.Sixteen years into the “Avatar” saga, Pandora is still abundant in box-office riches. “Fire and Ash,” the third film in Cameron’s science-fiction franchise, launched with $88 million domestically and $257 million internationally. The onl...

item.title: Exynos 2600 : Samsung dévoile sa puce 2 nm avant Apple
item.description: Après des mois de rumeurs, Samsung a fini par dévoiler la nouvelle puce maison qui équipera certains de ses smartphones haut de gamme : l'Exynos 2600. Et comme prévu, c'est la première du genre à être gravée en 2 nm, grillant ainsi la politesse à Apple.

item.title: Instacart is ending its controversial price tests
item.description: Instacart has announced it will be ending price testing on its platform. This comes after a study published earlier this month revealed pricing experiments that led to some customers seeing higher prices than others and the FTC saying last week it would be investigating the grocery delivery app. "Effective immediately, Instacart is ending all item price tests on our platform. Retailers will no longer be able to use Eversight technology to run item price tests on Instacart," an Instacart spokesperson shared with Engadget. The blog post called out "misconceptions and misinformation," maintaining...

item.title: Une première : l’alliance Google-Thalès du Cloud reçoit la plus haute certification de cybersécurité de l’État
item.description: Des technologies cloud américaines labellisées SecNumCloud 3.2, la plus haute certification de l'État français, c'est possible. Pour la première fois, une offre hybride (une technologie cloud américaine opérée par une entreprise française) portée par Thalès et Google Cloud a reçu le précieux sésame.

item.title: Don’t miss out again — the excellent Breville Barista Express is back to its Black Friday price on Amazon
item.description: The Breville Barista Express is one of the best coffee makers according to our experts – and it's available for a record-low price right now on Amazon.

item.title: Le OnePlus 15R est un smartphone facilement réparable
item.description: Le nouveau smartphone de OnePlus obtient un score de réparabilité de 8,5 sur 10. Une note qui pourrait séduire les acheteurs en quête d'un appareil premium et durable.

item.title: La Banque Postale est en panne : c’est confirmé une cyberattaque touche tous les services de la Poste
item.description: Après une première panne d'envergure samedi, la Banque Postale est à nouveau en panne ce lundi matin du 22 décembre. La banque en ligne n'est pas la seule touchée, les autres services de La Poste subissent de plein fouet une panne informatique.

item.title: It’s finally time to retire the word ‘podcast’
item.description: According to YouTube's 2025 Recap feature, the podcast I consumed the most on its platform was Seth Meyers' recurring segment "A Closer Look" on his show Late Night. Last year, I would have argued that this is not a podcast. That it is, in fact, a clip of a TV show. But in 2025, with […]

item.title: Asus Rog Xbox Ally : déjà 120 € de remise pour cette console portable qui renferme un vrai PC
item.description: Bonne nouvelle pour ceux qui espéraient une baisse de prix sur la dernière console d’Asus, la ROG Xbox Ally : elle est désormais proposée à 479 euros au lieu de 599 euros.

item.title: Test de la Sharp HT-SBW320 : la finesse extrême au prix de l’immersion
item.description: Une barre de son 2.1 ultra-compacte, compatible Dolby Atmos et DTS:X, qui mesure moins de 4 cm de hauteur. Sharp promet ici une intégration facile dans les espaces réduits. Mais la physique a ses lois immuables : peut-on vraiment concilier un format aussi fin avec un son cinéma digne de ce nom ?

item.title: San Francisco’s power is mostly back after an outage that impacted 130,000 homes and businesses
item.description: San Francisco’s Pacific Gas and Electric Co. said a fire in a substation at 8th and Mission streets was to blame for some of the blackouts. Power was restored Sunday to the bulk of the 130,000 homes and businesses in San Francisco impacted by a massive outage a day earlier that caused major disruptions in the city.About 17,000 customers remained without power as of noon Sunday, Pacific Gas and Electric Co. said. PG&E said earlier its crews were working to restore electricity in several neighborhoods and small areas of downtown San Francisco following Saturday’s outage.PG&E in a statement said ...

item.title: « Derniers jours à ce prix » : on connaît le nouveau prix du forfait B&YOU Pure Fibre en janvier 2026
item.description: La Pure Fibre de B&YOU est de loin l'offre internet la plus intéressante du moment. Sans décodeur TV, sans téléphonie, sans chichis, juste le meilleur de la fibre et du Wi-Fi. Ce forfait s'apprête pourtant à connaître un changement majeur et on doute que ce soit en bien.

item.title: 'We put the most pressure on ourselves' — Tomb Raider studio head on remaking one of the most iconic games of all time
item.description: A Tomb Raider: Legacy of Atlantis developer has talked about the upcoming remake. TechRadar attended the Q&A session.

item.title: Rocket Lab stock price soars: Why the SpaceX rival is blasting off today
item.description: Shares in the California-based aerospace manufacturer, already up 182% this year, are getting another boost as the holiday trading week begins. Shares in Rocket Lab Corp were heading for their second day of gains on Monday after the aerospace manufacturer was named as one of four companies that will build tracking satellites for the U.S. Space Development Agency (SDA). ...

item.title: Intel Nova Lake : la piste de puces monstrueuses se confirme pour lutter contre les Ryzen X3D d’AMD
item.description: Des informations relatives aux futures solutions Nova Lake, celles à mémoire cache bLLC, nous renseignent avec plus de certitude sur ce que prépare Intel sur ce terrain. Et en l'occurrence, la firme sortirait les grands moyens pour concurrencer correctement les puissantes puces Ryzen 3D V-Cache d'AMD.

item.title: Google and Apple employees on US visas apparently told to avoid international travel
item.description: Big Tech lawyers are warning employees not to leave the US, or they could face major delays re-entering.

item.title: The best board games to gift and play with the family for the 2025 holiday season
item.description:
Once upon a time, a "board game" meant Monopoly or Risk. Then several brave souls dared to ask the question: "What if this was fun?" Thirty years later, we're blessed with tabletop games that challenge our minds, immerse us in other worlds and conjure good times with those we love — sometimes all three at once. For your gift-buying needs, we've put together a list of new favorites and returning classics that run the gamuts of genre and weight. If you're ready to push beyond Pictionary, read on. Best board games to gift (and play) this holiday season
Check out the re...

item.title: J’ai conduit la Nio Firefly électrique à moins de 30 000 € : un comportement routier bluffant, mais deux points noirs pour l’Europe
item.description: J'ai eu l'occasion de tester la Nio Firefly électrique disponible en Europe à moins de 30 000 € lors de trois événements en Chine. La voiture a fait un certain buzz dans les réseaux sociaux avec sa version rallie. Nous avons pu conduire la version classique. Voici notre avis.

item.title: Readers’ Choice Awards 2025: Your Favorite Phones, Laptops, Gaming Gear, and More
item.description: You guys voted, and now we've got the winners for your favorite tech in 18 product categories.

item.title: Grado Signature S750 Review: Insane Sound, Old-School Fit
item.description: These open-back headphones sound insane, but they aren't that comfortable.

item.title: The best books we read in 2025
item.description: These days when you want to engage with some media, you can choose from podcasts, videos, games, live performances - or books, one of the oldest and most popular ways to learn something new or escape (at least temporarily) from today's troubled world. We polled the staff of The Verge to find out what books […]

item.title: How to pair controllers with the Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: The Nintendo Switch 2 supports a wide range of controllers, from Nintendo’s own Pro Controller to many Bluetooth gamepads you might already have. Whether you’re setting up your new console for the first time or adding extra controllers for multiplayer games, pairing them is simple as long as you know where to look. Here’s how to connect the Switch 2 Pro Controller, how to sync additional Bluetooth controllers and what to do if something doesn’t pair correctly.Before you start: What you’ll needTo pair any controller with the Switch 2 you’ll need the console powered on and updated to the latest ...

item.title: Foldable phone makers have solved every issue except one
item.description: It might be hard to believe, but foldable phones have already been around for the better part of a decade. Granted, the first one I saw back in 2019 — which actually predates Samsung's Galaxy Fold — was a cobbled-together mess. But since then, phone makers have been steadily iterating and tweaking their designs, and this year, manufacturers have finally addressed all the major issues about foldable phones except one: price.Let’s go back to the OG Fold. Even though it was chunky and heavy, had a tiny exterior display and suffered from a hinge that let too much detritus inside (which is probabl...

item.title: Oppo Find X9 Ultra : son idée audacieuse pour dépasser Samsung en photo
item.description: Le prochain Oppo Find X9 Ultra pourrait bien redéfinir la photographie mobile, avec deux capteurs de 200 Mpx et un double téléobjectif dont l’un atteindrait un zoom optique équivalent X10. S’il voyait le jour, il offrirait une portée théorique allant jusqu’à 460 mm et pourrait même inaugurer le tout premier capteur 200 Mpx signé Sony.

item.title: Federal judge blocks Louisiana’s social media age verification law – here's why
item.description: Another state-level attempt to enforce age verification on social media has been blocked. A federal judge ruled Louisiana's Act 456 unconstitutional, citing major privacy and First Amendment concerns.

item.title: ChatGPT 5.2 peut devenir plus chaleureux grâce à ce réglage
item.description: OpenAI dévoile un nouveau réglage permettant d'ajuster la personnalité de ChatGPT. De quoi ajouter un peu de chaleur dans un modèle robotique parfois insolent.

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs aspirateurs balais laveurs en 2025 ?
item.description: Les aspirateurs balai laveurs combinent l'aspiration des sols avec un lavage à l'eau propre, qui peut même être combiné avec de la vapeur ou du détergent. Voici notre sélection des meilleurs modèles d'aspirateurs balais laveurs.
